name: Fallen London: Daylight
storyline: Join forces with a zailor and young rat to uncover the secrets of an abandoned model village. Journey to an island in the middle of the unterzee to uncover the painful legacy of an inventor's folly and confront the horror that lingers there still.
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exception Story for December, 2018. First entry in the Season of Hobbies
